name: com.unity.cloud.identity
description: Unity Cloud Identity provides client support for all Identity and Access Management (IAM) service features.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- `UnityEditorServiceAuthorizer` now activates the Unity Hub to refresh the Unity cloud services token if it was not automatically refreshed in time.

samples.description: Initialize an authenticator to demonstrate how to log in a user.
Use an authenticator to retrieve information about the logged-in user.
An EditorWindow sample that uses the UnityEditorServiceAuthorizer to fetch user information from Unity Cloud services.
